title: Screen View MCP
description: Using Anthropic's MCP SDK to enable AI assistants to capture and analyze screenshots using Claude Vision API.
longDescription:
# Screen View MCP

This project implements a **Multi-Capability Platform (MCP)** integration that enables AI assistants to capture and analyze screenshots.

## Features

- Real-time screenshot capture
- Integration with Claude Vision API for image analysis
- Support for multiple screen resolutions
- Cross-platform compatibility

## Implementation Details

The project was built using:

* TypeScript for type safety
* Node.js for the backend
* The Anthropic MCP SDK
* Claude Vision API for image processing

> This tool significantly enhances the capabilities of AI assistants, allowing them to directly observe and interact with what's on the user's screen.

title: Latent
description: Research project exploring latent space cross-attention mechanisms in transformers.
longDescription: In-depth exploration of latent space representations and cross-attention in transformer models. This research involved implementing custom PyTorch modules and experimenting with various datasets.

title: ConverseGPT
description: GPT-based chat app and infrastructure-as-code backend.
longDescription: A full-stack application featuring a React frontend and a Python backend powered by GPT. The infrastructure was defined using AWS CDK (IaC), ensuring scalability and reproducibility.
